      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static LinkBuilder LinkBuilderFactory.forAsset​(com.day.cq.dam.api.Asset asset, boolean mapped)
      Get a builder instance for the given Asset, using the asset's metadata title (or name, if not present) as the link title.
      static LinkBuilder LinkBuilderFactory.forEmail​(String emailAddress)
      Get a builder instance to build a "mailto:" link for the given email address.

      Get an empty link builder instance ("#").

      Get a builder instance for an existing Link.

      Get a builder instance for a path.
      static LinkBuilder LinkBuilderFactory.forPath​(String path, ResourceResolver resourceResolver)
      Get a builder instance for a path and resource resolver, using the resource resolver to map the given path in the built link.
      static LinkBuilder LinkBuilderFactory.forResource​(Resource resource)
      Get a builder instance for a resource.
      static LinkBuilder LinkBuilderFactory.forResource​(Resource resource, boolean mapped)
      Get a builder instance for a resource using the mapped path on the returned builder.
      static LinkBuilder LinkBuilderFactory.forTelephoneNumber​(String telephoneNumber)
      Get a builder instance to build a "tel:" link for the given telephone number.
